00036 typedef vector<NonTerminal*>::const_iterator NontIter;
00037 typedef vector<Terminal*>::const_iterator TermIter;
00038 
00046 class Grammar 
00047 {
00048 
00049  public:
00050 
00051   Grammar() : startSymbol(NULL), levels(NULL) {}
00052 
00053   friend ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & out, const Grammar & gram) {
00054     out << "START SYMBOL: " << *(gram.startSymbol) << std::endl;
00055     out << "TERMINALS:" << std::endl;
00056     for(TermIter ptr = gram.terminals.begin();
00057         ptr != gram.terminals.end(); ++ptr) {
00058       out << **ptr << "\t";
00059     }
00060     out << std::endl;
00061     out << "NON-TERMINALS:" << std::endl;
00062     for (NontIter normPtr = gram.prodRules.begin();
00063          normPtr != gram.prodRules.end(); ++normPtr) {
00064       (*normPtr)->printDefinition(out);
00065     }
00066     return out;
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00070   Terminal *addTerminal(const string &);  
00071   Terminal *getTerminal(const string &);  
00072   NonTerminal *addNonTerminal(const string &);  
00073   NonTerminal *getNonTerminal(const string &);  
00074 
00075   int printUndefined(ostream &);
00076   int countTerminals() const {
00077     return terminals.size();
00078   }
00079   int countNonTerminals() const {
00080     return prodRules.size();
00081   }
